bibl.title: Notes on Some Greek Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. P. Mich. Inv. 4703 (= C.P.L. 210). A marriage contract of a veteran of the Classis Alexandrina. - 2. W.L. Westermann, "Tuscus the Prefect and the veterani in Egypt: P. Yale Inv. 1528 and P. Fouad 21". CP 26 (1941) pp. 21-29. - 3. On the metrological meaning of a "donkey". - 4. P. bibl. univ. Giss. 22.
bibl.seg: Segrè Angelo, Notes on Some Greek Papyri.
145.4 P. bibl. univ. Giss. III, 22 P. Fouad 21 P. Yale Inv. 1528 145.5 P. Mich. Inv. 4703
